page.title: 06YEARLY EVENTS IN PENISTONE.
page.content: Every year social{events}are held in Penistone such as Fairs,Shows and Parades.On the 28th of June a fair called the{Feast}arrives and stays for four days (although it is not open on the Sunday).There are rides such as the Big Wheel and Waltzers.The fair is only very small but nearly all of Penistone arrive and the noise can be heard from one side of Penistone to the other. At the beginning of September there is an {annual show }in Penistone with a Gymkana and Dressage event.The Scouts help to put the fences back up and help on stalls. There is Circus which comes each year this is also very small.Penistone has no large{shows.}
